Subject: Planned Activity Notification : Migration D3 share drives from On-premise server to Azure D3 server
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

We have scheduled the migration of the following file shares from the D3-fileserver to the cloud-based Azure fileserver VMAZ-UAEN-FS2 to ensure file availability.

 

Please be aware that during the below period, access to the shares hosted on D3-fileserver will not be available.

 

Maintenance start time: Fri, 15 Aug 2025, 9:30 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Mon, 18 Aug 2025, 07:00 AM GST

 

* IMPORTANT PREPARATION INFORMATION *

 

To prevent any disruption following the migration, we suggest creating and keeping a list of your currently mapped network drives before the above maintenance commences. This will ensure that all drives can be re-mapped to your PC once they are migrated to the new cloud server.

 

Kindly follow these instructions to check your currently mapped drives.

*	Open File Explorer (Windows key + E).
*	Select "This PC" in the left pane.
*	The mapped network drives will be listed under "Network". 
*	Please note down the names of these drives until after the migration.
